Advanced Reporting in ServiceNow

Make it Work

First things first...

In this chapter, we'll focus on getting a "something" working. It may not be great (or even good), but before we try to learn anything advanced, let's be sure we can get the basics working.

Make it Right

Once we have something that "works", let's consider the many ways in which what we've created is, well, just plain wrong.

In any attempt to get something working, quickly, there will be a good chance that what we end up with is a bit of a mess. Our report may appear unresponsive (slow), the code may be hard to maintain and extend, and it might easily place undue burdens on the server or the client's network connection. Let's fix that.

Make it Fast

We might be able to skip this step...

In most cases, once you've made your report "right" it will already be fast, or at least, "fast enough". If, on the other hand, the report is particularly complex, or the data queries take a bit too long, there are some techniques we can use to speed things up.
